text: The 2018–19 Turkish Women's Basketball League (also known as Turkish Women’s Basketball Super League) (, KBSL) was the 39th edition of the top-flight professional women's basketball league in Turkey. Fenerbahçe are the defending champions. ==Player movement== ==Regular season== ===Standings=== == Playoffs == ==Turkish clubs in European competitions== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Club !!
